interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Kai-Lan's Great Trip to China
Review Date: 2013/06/18
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Animation
Product Description: ["Join Kai-Lan and her friends Rintoo, Tolee and Ho Ho on their exciting trip to China! In the double-length, feature episode Kai-lan and her friends travel to visit her aunt and a baby panda in China, and are amazed by all the things they see along the way! The DVD includes 2 additional episodes, plus a Kai-Lan Goes to China game. Special Features: Full Frame Audio: Dolby Digital, Stereo - English Features: 1. Music Video: We're Going to China Music Video Runtime: 96 Minutes."]
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Animation', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '097368931046', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 14, 2009', 'Studio': 'Nickelodeon', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: my 4 yr old grandaughter loves these movies.I couldnt find any of them in the stores so I was very glad to be able to find them on the amazon. I like the fact that each one of these kinds of movies teaches  about different cultures and lifestyles in a way that is interesting for little kids.
Review Title: good culture movie
Rating: 5.0

Ni Hao Kai-Lan: Princess Kai-Lan
U, Karen Chau  (Director),     Chau, Karen  (Director),     Peters, Jade-Lianna  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Movies & TV Holiday Wishlist
['Kai-lan, Rintoo, Tolee and Hoho are playing in the backyard when they get a visit from their superhero friend, the Monkey King, who really needs their help. Will Kai-lan and her friends go on an adventure with the Monkey King and see what they can do? Of course they will! The Monkey King gives them robes to wear that give them special powers to float, jump, and spin in the air! They’ll have to use their special powers – and the viewer’s help – to leap over bamboo forests, travel past a moat of giant bubbles, and find their way into the majestic palaces.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest**: Enthusiastic about action and adventure genre films while increasingly drawn to family-friendly content that educates children about diverse cultures and lifestyles through engaging storytelling.
- **Shopping Behavior**: Prioritizes cost-effectiveness by favoring bulk purchases and multi-pack options to maximize savings.
- **Content Format Preference**: Enjoys collecting physical media, particularly DVDs, which reflects a desire for tangible family experiences and the ability to share with loved ones.
- **Quality Expectations**: Holds high standards for shipping speed and overall product satisfaction, often providing glowing feedback for satisfactory purchases.
- **Entertainment Value**: Seeks collections that provide varied content, highlighting a preference for nostalgic classics suitable for intergenerational viewership. Recent interests reveal a focus on educational films for younger audiences.
- **Rating Behavior**: Tends to rate highly when products meet or exceed expectations, especially valuing delivery speed, content quality, and educational merit.
- **Interaction Retrospective**: Demonstrates a strong commitment to sourcing satisfying family-oriented films, showcasing an emerging blend of personal interests and educational value in the entertainment chosen for children.

Overall, the user combines a love for action and animation with an emphasis on cultural storytelling, while maintaining a strong focus on value and quality in their entertainment choices.
